Articles.Content:
This is a satellite launch clip recorded within The Kerbal Space Program using various mods for an up-coming part-animated adventure that will become part of a series of adventures within the Kerbal Space Program universe. Stay tuned!

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/VYQu02lVT9Q" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Edited August 15, 2012 by olex
merging a double post
If you want my honest opinion, This is the best video I've seen on the Artwork Community.
My gosh. It's made of win. Sir, you deserve a MEDAL for this touching video. This is THE BEST video of a launch I have EVER seen. Ever. *Claps while bawling*
With some nice IVA shots when that comes available, there can be whole movies made using KSP. I love your satelite launch btw. Keep at it!
This should be on the front page.
This is beautiful, have a deserved +rep from me. I've also merged your double post.
I like the video, especially the shake looks good
Very nice Camera work and post processing. Hopefully not your last video!

Very nice Camera work and post processing. Hopefully not your last video!

Thanks, I'm just getting started!
That was hauntingly beautiful, what software did u use, where did u get the music?

That was hauntingly beautiful, what software did u use, where did u get the music?

I've added that in the video description
Good God man, that's brilliant! I love it!
This is amazing. It should be a ksp commerical

Aw yeah, that was epic. And one heck of a way to introduce yourself.

Nice use of post-production effects, good composition and choice of music. I look forward to seeing more from you.
